creator: aniruddha_joag@hotmail.com
text: The last row of the sheet does not fire LastCellOfRowDummyRecord. This happens for every sheet in the workbook.

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: Any chance you could create a (failing) unit test for this?

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text:
There is some code in MissingRecordAwareHSSFListener which should detect when we reach the end of the cells in a sheet, and fire off one last LastCellOfRowDummyRecord

If that's not working, could you please create a failing unit test that shows the problem, so we've something to debug it against?
We did not get enough information to work on this bug, so resolving this one for now, please reopen with a unit test that shows the problem if this is still an issue.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
